search.query: (index=_internal source=*splunkd.log* (log_level=ERROR OR log_level=WARN) (component=AggregatorMiningProcessor OR component=DateParserVerbose OR component=LineBreakingProcessor)) | rex field=_raw "Context: source(::|=)(?<context_source>[^\\|]*?)\\|host(::|=)(?<context_host>[^\\|]*?)\\|(?<context_sourcetype>[^\\|]*?)\\|" | eval data_source=if((isnull(data_source) AND isnotnull(context_source)),context_source,data_source), data_sourcetype=if((isnull(data_sourcetype) AND isnotnull(context_sourcetype)),context_sourcetype,data_sourcetype) | stats c by data_sourcetype,component,_raw,host
|tstats count where index=* sourcetype=$sourcetype$ by index |fields index

panel.title: Sourcetypes by Hosts and their type

search.query: index=_internal source=*metrics.log group=per_sourcetype_thruput series="$sourcetype$" (host=idm*.splunkcloud.com OR host!=*splunkcloud.com) | eval host=lower(host) | stats c by host | fields - c | rename host as hostname | join hostname [ search index=_internal source=*metrics.log group=tcpin_connections (hostname=idm*.splunkcloud.com OR hostname!=*splunkcloud.com) group=tcpin_connections | eval hostname=lower(hostname) | stats c by hostname, fwdType | fields - c]
index=$index$ sourcetype=$sourcetype$ | rex "^(?<LINE_BREAKER>.*?)\s" |stats c by LINE_BREAKER |sort -c
index=$index$ sourcetype=$sourcetype$| eval len_raw=len(_raw) |stats c by len_raw |sort -len_raw | head 10

| eval data_host = if(isnull(data_host) AND isnotnull(context_host), context_host, data_host) | search data_sourcetype="$sourcetype$" | stats count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor" OR component=="DateParserVerbose" OR component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) as total_issues dc(data_source) AS "Source Count" count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor")) AS "Line Breaking Issues" count(eval(component=="DateParserVerbose")) AS "Timestamp Parsing Issues" count(eval(component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) AS "Aggregation Issues" by data_sourcetype | sort - total_issues | rename data_sourcetype as Sourcetype total_issues as "Total Issues"
|search data_sourcetype=$sourcetype$ component=LineBreakingProcessor | rex "data_host=\"(?<data_host>.*?)\"" |stats c by data_host | fields - c
| search data_sourcetype=$sourcetype$ component=DateParserVerbose | rex "\|host\=(?<data_host>.*?)\|" | stats c by data_host | fields - c

single.title: Max Length of Line Breaking error

search.query: search data_sourcetype=$sourcetype$ component=LineBreakingProcessor | rex "line length \>\= (?<len>\w+)\s" | stats max(len)
